reviewText: The 7 dragons have some strange powers, and even stranger appearances. Pan and Goku have recovered 3 balls so far, but he dragon of Earth is very powerful. He lacks physical strength, but he makes up for it with cunning. He takes Pan hostage and makes Goku helpless.
I loved the Graphic Novels of Dragon ball and Z but they edited it on cartoon network all the content adults call *bad*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
